Text:
Hello and back again. Q: why SH2 Greatest Hits if you have already upload SH2?

I say: please Big Dude, can you upload the following games?:
- Silent Hill Origins
- Resident Evil 4, Outbreak 1&2
- Enter the Matrix
- Syphon Filter Dark Mirror
- Tomb Raider Legend, Anniversary, Underworld

I think you have uploaded other games except for them, it would complete the sagas.

Thanks a lot, and I wish you could upload at least some of them.

Greetings
user2101, Unlike in the SH2 regular edition in the Greatest hits addition you can do some levels as Maria, in the regular version you are restricted to playing only James.
what file should i burn? mds or iso??
